title: Valartis lance une offre publique d'achat sur ENR Russia Invest
cleaned_sentences: Zurich (AWP) - The Zugois Valartis banking group wishes to fully use the Geneva participation company ENR Russia.
The price of the offer amounts to 5.60 Swiss francs per share ENR.
The offer of the offer is expected to be published in October 2024, Valartis said on Wednesday in a press release.
The public purchase offer should be finalized in December 2024.
Valartis has held the ENR Russia Invest since August 97.9% of the actions capital.
The Zugois banking group had then sold its shares in Athris, another Zugoise participation company.
In exchange, Valartis had received 892,703 shares ENR Russia Invest, as well as a cash payment.
